column4: i would like to know the difference between a primary and extended partition. i will use ext3 on a 2nd HDD to use as a backup
there is no significant difference, really
it doesn't really matter, but you can't have more than 4 primary partitions, and 4 subpartitions per extended partition
http://www.ata-atapi.com/hiwtab.htm explains it in detail, but probably you don't really need to read it
